
        [console_scripts]
        wex = wex.command:main

        [pytest11]
        wex = wex.pytestplugin

        [wex.method.http]
        get = wex.http:request
        post = wex.http:request

        [wex.method.https]
        get = wex.http:request
        post = wex.http:request

        [wex.method.ftp]
        get = wex.ftp:get

        [wex]
        robots.txt = wex.sitemaps:urls_from_robots_txt
        sitemaps = wex.sitemaps:urls_from_sitemap
